publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2147# Linda Fabiani: Refugee Ship—That the Parliament commends the people of East Timor for their humanitarian action in offering sanctuary to the boat refugees refused permission to land by the Australian Government and congratulates this newly emerging independent democracy on its ready acceptance of international responsibility.
S1M-2147# Refugee Ship (lodged on 31 August 2001) Shona Robison*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2147 Refugee Ship (lodged on 31 August 2001) Alex Neil*, Michael Matheson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-2147 Refugee Ship (lodged on 31 August 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Christine Grahame*, Ms Sandra White*

S1M-2147 Linda Fabiani: Refugee Ship-That the Parliament commends the people of East Timor for their humanitarian action in offering sanctuary to the boat refugees refused permission to land by the Australian Government and congratulates this newly emerging independent democracy on its ready acceptance of international responsibility. Supported by: Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Christine Grahame, Ms Sandra White
S1M-2147 Refugee Ship (lodged on 31 August 2001) Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2147 Refugee Ship (lodged on 31 August 2001) Robin Harper*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-2147 Refugee Ship (lodged on 31 August 2001) Brian Adam*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Michael Russell*

S1M-2147 Linda Fabiani: Refugee Ship—That the Parliament commends the people of East Timor for their humanitarian action in offering sanctuary to the boat refugees refused permission to land by the Australian Government and congratulates this newly emerging independent democracy on its ready acceptance of international responsibility. Supported by: Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Christine Grahame, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Robin Harper, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Brian Adam, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Michael Russell
S1M-2147 Refugee Ship (lodged on 31 August 2001) Pauline McNeill*

S1M-2147 Linda Fabiani: Refugee Ship-That the Parliament commends the people of East Timor for their humanitarian action in offering sanctuary to the boat refugees refused permission to land by the Australian Government and congratulates this newly emerging independent democracy on its ready acceptance of international responsibility. Supported by: Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Christine Grahame, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Robin Harper, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Brian Adam, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Michael Russell, Pauline McNeill
S1M-2147 Refugee Ship (lodged on 31 August 2001) Roseanna Cunningham*

S1M-2147 Linda Fabiani: Refugee Ship-That the Parliament commends the people of East Timor for their humanitarian action in offering sanctuary to the boat refugees refused permission to land by the Australian Government and congratulates this newly emerging independent democracy on its ready acceptance of international responsibility. Supported by: Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Christine Grahame, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Robin Harper, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Brian Adam, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Michael Russell, Pauline McNeill, Roseanna Cunningham
